Room.Name: Delaney Drive/Islandia Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Delaney Drive and Islandia Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Delaney Drive runs north from Islandia Road, which runs to the east and west. On the south side of the road is the Adlermann Center of Marine Research and Oceanography. The fancy academy is located off the coast of the Rhinestone Marina. On the northeast corner of the road is the Cathedral of Worldly Bliss, and the War Veteran's Historical Library is located on the opposite corner.
